title: Stop picking malphite, he isnt viable
body:
He is the only tank that doesnt deal damage while building tank.

Oh you like his ult? 

pick chogath, he has the ult on a 6 sec cd. 
pick alistar, he has the ult and the damage and the tankiness but doesnt waste a top spot.

Oh you like... nothing else. malph has no redeeming qualities other than his ult.

that is all
